description:
An evolution to the Rhino line of carabiners. The new Ceros carabiner has all the features of the Rhino, with a couple key quality of life improvements. The integrated wire gate makes it easier than ever to put (and keep) your carabiner right where you want it for belaying. Precise CNC machining provides enhance grip on the screw-lock. And, the Rhino’s horn is there to prevent cross-loading, by preventing assisted locking belay devices from rotating off the top bar and on to the spine.

  • Wire gate keeps your carabine properly aligned on your harness’s belay loop
  • “Horn” keeps the assisted braking devices from migrating to the spine of the carabiner
  • Full upper cross-section resists wear and promotes smooth rope control
  • Updated machining on the screw-lock offers an improved grip, without being more aggressive on your gear
name: DMM Ceros Screwgate Carabiner
